As Meteara came out of the artificial slumber that had been induced 
by the sphere, she managed to stand up. The field around the light 
ball contained some of the radiations, so she could stay in robot 
mode. She leaned heavily on a wall and Looked around.

Meteara: Firaxis? Where are you?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: I think they've been asleep long enough eh?
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        He awoke to a resounding thud.  He wasn't sure exactly what 
that thud 
> was or why he was asleep but he was pretty sure it had to do with 
excess 
> energon, Meteara, and a certain sphere.  He looks around and 
eventually 
> crawls over to Meteara.  "Ma'am, something seems to have fallen more 
or less 
> on our heads.  As disturbing as this is, it seems like we should 
check it 
> out.  In fact I'm going to do that."  He taps some controls on his 
arm and 
> Horn walks over groggily. "Whaddya want?"  Firaxis was more than a 
little 
> confused.  "You can talk?"  Horn looks at him apathetically.  "It 
certainly 
> seems that way now doesn't it.  I suppose you want to investigate 
that thud 
> we just heard."  Firaxis nods dumbfounded.  "Well lets go then,  
oopsI 
> forgot, master."  Firaxis shakes his head and they head back to the 
surface 
> to investigate the third Artifact also known as Thud.
